overview: MAMA'S BOY tells the story of a man who lives with his mother and is trying to rent out a room to earn extra money.  Girls are interviewed and during each interview he'll excuse himself.  He returns dressed as his mother and strangles the unsuspecting girl.  He then undresses her, sometimes having sex with her dead body.  In the tradition of W.A.V.E. Productions and SHOCK-O-RAMA, This DARK FANTASIES video explores the bizarre side of human nature.
title: Mama's Boy: Psycho Strangler
